dict.acceptation: 位于；说出来源；查找…的地点；确定…的位置；

sent.orig: The local police are trying to locate the missing child.
sent.trans: 当地警察正努力寻找失踪小孩。

sent.orig: Locate the target project directory and then select Paste on the Edit menu.
sent.trans: 定位到目标项目目录，然后选择“编辑”菜单上的“粘贴”。

sent.orig: Locate the remaining materials needed to complete the glider. Once completed, traverse to the underground laboratory.
sent.trans: 找到完成滑翔机所需的剩下的零件。一旦完成，穿过地下的实验室。

sent.orig: Using the Guess-Newton method to calculate linear least squre, locate the PD source.
sent.trans: 运用最小二乘法，利用声电信号的时延，进行定位计算，得到局部放电源的坐标。

sent.orig: Her quest to locate Jeff and Zac had taken two years.
sent.trans: 追寻杰夫和扎克和下落已经花了她现年时间。
